text: (minisun karana pāpayanhi hētuven) ihaḷa æti ahasa pupurā (æda væṭennaṭa)da iḍa æta. (namut) malāyikāvarun (biya vī) tamangē deviyanva praśaṁsā kara, suviśuddha kara, bhūmiyehi siṭinnan(gē væradi valaṭa) samāva dena men ayadimin siṭinnāha. (minisun pāpayangen ǣt vī samāva illā siṭiyahot) niyata vaśayenma allāhma imahat kṣamā karanneku hā karuṇāvantava siṭinnēya yanna (nabiyē! oba dæna ganu (mænava)
